metadata.description: Personal collection of Claude Code skills and plugins by Algiras

plugins.name: memory-palace-red-queen
plugins.description: Transform information into durable knowledge using the method of loci with adversarial recall testing (Red Queen Protocol)

plugins.name: qmd
plugins.description: Local-first search engine for markdown docs, knowledge bases, and meeting notes. BM25 + vector + LLM re-ranking.

plugins.name: skillz
plugins.description: Self-extending MCP server - build and execute custom AI tools at runtime via Rust WASM

plugins.name: rknowledge
plugins.description: Knowledge graph extraction CLI. Extract concepts and relationships from documents using LLMs, store in Neo4j.

plugins.name: clean-docs
plugins.description: Documentation quality CLI - validate code snippets, detect broken links, auto-fix issues, CI/CD integration

plugins.name: embedeval
plugins.description: Binary pass/fail LLM evaluation CLI. Trace-centric, error-analysis-first approach.

plugins.name: rusty-pageindex
plugins.description: High-performance document indexer. Hierarchical TOC trees for vectorless, reasoning-based RAG.

plugins.name: engram
plugins.description: Conversation memory system for Claude Code. Archive JSONL sessions, extract knowledge via LLMs, full-text search, TUI browser, and MCP server.
